name: Escape From Paradise
description: A luxury cruise ship crashes on an uncharted island in the Pacific Ocean. The survivors of the shipwreck are very different from one another and decide to set up their own camps all over the island. Your goal is to find the pieces to a lost radio, and hoist it on the top of the volcano located in the center of the main island.
minimum_requirements: OS: 98/ME2000/XP/VistaProcessor: 700 MHz CPUMemory: 256 MB RAMHard Disk Space: 42 MBDirectX®: 7

reviews.review_text: Casual time waster, at least it will happy play itself while you do something else.
